page.title: 18SHOPS AND SHOPPING
page.content: If I want to go shopping for clothes I usually go into Sunderland which is the nearest town to Pennywell. There are no large department stores, furniture stores or boutiques in Pennywell. We go by bus or car. Opposite our house there are 4 small shops-fruiterer, baker & confectioner, grocery and one vacant which used to be a butcher's. There are other streets with small shops near us but they are similar to those I've described and do not carry a very big range of goods. We do our weekly shop at one of the big stores in Sunderland or Washington. There is quite a rapid change over in the small shops probably because high unemployment in the area keeps spending down. Many of the shops have their windows boarded up against burglary and vandalism.
